resources.string: Point the camera lens towards a public transportation vehicle. You can find information about the recognized line at the bottom of the screen.
Why do I have to choose a vehicle type?
Narrowing down a vehicle type criterion improves accuracy of line number recognition.

The basis for recognizing the line number of a public transportation vehicle is the image from the camera. Without it, the application will not be able to recognize the line number. Do you want to try again?
